specialRules.name: Forward Force
specialRules.description: This character has superior deployment capabilities.

specialRules.name: Battlefield Drills
specialRules.description: At the end of the Round's Supremacy Phase select up to two target Friendly Infantry Regiments within 12" of this Character Stand can each receive one of the specified benefits.

specialRules.name: Barrage (4) (18")
specialRules.description: This Character Stand may perform a Volley Action with 4 Barrage dice and a range of 18 inches.

specialRules.name: Wizard (6)
specialRules.description: This Character Stand may perform Spellcasting Actions using 6 Spellcasting dice.

specialRules.name: Personal Bodyguard
specialRules.description: You may select an Infantry Regiment in this Character's Warband to gain the [Veteran] Battlefield Role if they do not already have it.

specialRules.name: Brutal Impact (2)
specialRules.description: This Regiment's Impact Attacks gain the Cleave (2) special rule.

specialRules.name: Impact (3)
specialRules.description: This Regiment makes 3 Impact Attack dice per Stand when it successfully completes a Charge.

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: This Regiment adds 1 to its Defense Characteristic against attacks originating from its front arc.

specialRules.name: Personal Entourage
specialRules.description: You may select a Household Knight Regiment in this Character's Warband to gain the [Veteran] Battlefield Role if they do not already have it.

specialRules.name: Cleave (2)
specialRules.description: Reduce the target's Defense by 2 when this Regiment makes attacks.

specialRules.name: Flurry
specialRules.description: This Regiment may Re-Roll failed Hit Rolls during a Clash Action.

specialRules.name: Devout
specialRules.description: This Regiment may use the Divine Purpose special rule when targeted by a Theist Priest's Spell.

specialRules.name: Path of Righteousness
specialRules.description: Regiments in this Character's Warband gain the [Theist] Battlefield Role and Indomitable (+1) Special Rule (to a maximum of 2).

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: Reduce the target's Defense by 1 when this Regiment makes attacks.

specialRules.name: Devout
specialRules.description: This Regiment may use the Divine Purpose special rule when targeted by a Theist Priest's Spell.

specialRules.name: Fearless
specialRules.description: This Regiment automatically passes Resolve Characteristic Tests.

specialRules.name: Priest (6)
specialRules.description: This Character Stand may perform Spellcasting Actions using 6 Spellcasting dice.

specialRules.name: Impact (4)
specialRules.description: This Regiment makes 4 Impact Attack dice per Stand when it successfully completes a Charge.

name: Errant of the Order of the Shield

specialRules.name: Cleave (2)
specialRules.description: Reduce the target's Defense by 2 when this Regiment makes attacks.

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: This Regiment adds 1 to its Defense Characteristic against attacks originating from its front arc.

specialRules.name: Up In Arms!
specialRules.description: This Character may add one additional Mainstay Regiment in their Warband, ignoring the usual allowance of four Regiments per Warband, to a maximum of five.

specialRules.name: Drive for Justice
specialRules.description: The Infantry Regiment this Character is currently attached to gains the Fearless Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Like Gods Among Men
specialRules.description: When a Friendly Cavalry [The Orders] Regiment successfully completes a Charge against an Enemy Regiment, all Infantry Regiments currently within 8" of that Friendly [The Orders] Regiment immediately perform a free, out-of-sequence Rally or Combat Rally Action and gain the Inspired Special Rule until the end of the Round.

specialRules.name: Fluid Formation
specialRules.description: This Regiment can move through friendly Regiments during a March, Charge, Reform or Withdraw Action.

specialRules.name: Vanguard (3)
specialRules.description: This Regiment may move up to 3 inches after deployment, but before the first Round.

specialRules.name: Barrage (3) (16")
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a Volley Action with 3 Barrage dice per Stand and a range of 16 inches.

specialRules.name: Advanced Scout Training
specialRules.description: Should this Regiment has the [Veteran] Battlefield Role, it always counts as Obscured against Enemy Volley Actions.

specialRules.name: Barrage (3) (16", Armor Piercing (1))
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a Volley Action with 3 Barrage dice per Stand and a range of 16 inches. These attacks have Armor Piercing (1).

specialRules.name: Advanced Target Training
specialRules.description: Should this Regiment has the [Veteran] Battlefield Role, when its Stands contribute Shots against a Target within Effective Range they add +1 to their Volley Characteristic until the end of that Action.

specialRules.name: Barrage (3) (16", Armor Piercing (1))
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a Volley Action with 3 Barrage dice per Stand and a range of 16 inches. These attacks have Armor Piercing (1).

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: Reduce the target's Defense by 1 when this Regiment makes attacks.

specialRules.name: Fearless
specialRules.description: This Regiment automatically passes Resolve Characteristic Tests.

specialRules.name: Fiend Hunter
specialRules.description: This Regiment gains +1 Attack dice when targeting Monsters, Cavalry, Brutes, or Character Stands.

specialRules.name: Flank
specialRules.description: When this Regiment is deploying as Reinforcements, it may be deployed from any edge of the Battlefield.

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: This Regiment adds 1 to its Defense Characteristic against attacks originating from its front arc.

specialRules.name: Advanced Infantry Training
specialRules.description: Should this Regiment has the [Veteran] Battlefield Role, it gains the Support (+1) Special Rule. If the Regiment does not already have the Support (X) Special Rule it gains the Support (2) Special Rule instead.

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: Reduce the target's Defense by 1 when this Regiment makes attacks.

specialRules.name: Iron Discipline
specialRules.description: This Regiment never needs to make a Resolve Characteristic Test to Reform or Combat Reform.

specialRules.name: Support (3)
specialRules.description: When this Regiment is engaged with an Enemy, each unengaged Stand contributes 3 Support Attack dice instead of 1.

specialRules.name: Pike Formation
specialRules.description: Enemy Regiments suffer -3 to their Impact (X) Special Rule (to a minimum of 0) when in contact with this Regiment's front arc. In addition, Enemy Regiments that have performed a successful Charge against this Regiment's front arc do not benefit from the Inspired and Shock Special Rules until the end of the Round.

drawEvents.name: Bastion (1)
drawEvents.description: This Regiment can withstand tremendous punishment.

specialRules.name: Bravery
specialRules.description: This Regiment gains the Inspired Special Rule even when not Charging.

specialRules.name: Cleave (2)
specialRules.description: Reduce the target's Defense by 2 when this Regiment makes attacks.

specialRules.name: Oblivious
specialRules.description: This Regiment automatically passes Resolve Tests while they have a Character Stand attached to them.

specialRules.name: Support (2)
specialRules.description: When this Regiment is engaged with an Enemy, each unengaged Stand contributes 2 Support Attack dice instead of 1.

specialRules.name: Barrage (3) (22", Arcing Fire, Armor Piercing (1))
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a Volley Action with 3 Barrage dice per Stand and a range of 22 inches with Arcing Fire. These attacks have Armor Piercing (1).

specialRules.description: This Regiment makes 2 Impact Attack dice per Stand when it successfully completes a Charge.

specialRules.name: Opportunists
specialRules.description: This Regiment adds +1 to its Clash Characteristic when attacking Enemy Fleeing Regiments.

specialRules.name: Advanced Vanguard Training
specialRules.description: Should this Regiment has the [Veteran] Battlefield Role, when this Regiment becomes the Target of an Enemy Regiment's Volley Action it gains the Tenacious (2) Special Rule until the end of that Action.

specialRules.description: When this Regiment becomes the Target of a friendly Theist Priest's Spell, during its Activation the Regiment may choose to either add +2" to its first March Action OR +2" to its Charge Distance until the end of the Round.
